title: The Field Guide to Evil
text:
The Field Guide To Evil is a 2018 <a href="anthology">anthology</a> <a href="horror%20film">horror film</a> produced by <a href="Legion%20M">Legion M</a>. Eight film makers from different countries bring stories or folk tales from their country to the anthology.
Plot.
The film comprises treatises on forbidden love, Greek underworld goblins, medieval Hungarian cobblers and US hillbilly folklore.
The stories and filmmakers come from:
Reception.
The critical reception has been mostly positive, receiving rating on <a href="Rotten%20Tomatoes">Rotten Tomatoes</a>. Opening at the <a href="South%20by%20Southwest">SXSW Festival</a>, the film was nominated for the SXSW Gamechanger Award.
